about_the_game:
It's the annual Catawauloo scout camping trip at Farmer Calico's farm! The cat scouts are excited to earn new badges and play their favorite games, especially the big sack race!

Click, slide, & spin objects to find hidden cats and other floofs in four catastical worlds. Locate all the cats to give them their race sacks before a big autumn storm rolls in...and some unexpected guests drop by?

Can't believe this is real!


I’m excited, and - let’s be honest, a little terrified, to be announcing my first ever real video game. Who could have ever predicted that winning a Tandy TRS80 in a coloring contest from Radioshack back in the 80's would lead to this? I made this game primarily to learn the programming language C# and the Unity engine but after receiving positive feedback from others, decided to make it something to share. Along with the audio finesesses of SpongeCC, we hope you enjoy this taste of kitty goodness and will help us make the full game a reality!

What will the future full game include?

  • Multiple colorful worlds to search & explore
  • A menagerie of fuzzy friends & out of this world visitors
  • Real life kitty voice actors, original music & twists on old favorites
  • Secrets to find & puzzles to uncover
  • Easter eggs, easter eggs, easter eggs

Where did the idea of CatSacks come from?


Welp, when I mentioned to some friends that my first game would be a small CYOA (Choose Your Own Adventure) gamebook in Unity based on the first part of a hacktivist novel I had been writing since 2015, somehow the conversation produced the phrase ‘cat sacks’. My whole first game idea changed in that instant.

Many thanks in advance for wishlisting...

...and please don't hesitate to reach out with feedback, I appreciate you taking the time to 'paws' here for a quick miao!

short_description: CatSacks is a cozy hidden object game of fuzzy friends with a little twist of Rube Goldbergesque puzzle solving fun. Click, slide, & spin objects to find hidden cats & other animals in four catastical worlds. Cat finds lovingly voiced by my real life kitties & friend's floofs!
